About me

I learned alot about programming and computer science during COVID-19, and along with that I grew my passion for Aviation, I can fly a C152 all the way up to an Airbus A380, the largest aircraft in commercial service.

Today I know JavaScript, Python, Java, and some React, my goal is to become familiar with React and frontend better.

View GitHub

Contributions

PeakSMP

With a goal of providing a high-performance experience, PeakSMP connects players and bridges the gap between Java Edition players and Bedrock Edition players, all in one unified world. This is my most active project to date with 48 unique players per day. Just put in the IP listed in the Discord right into your game, and you are all set!

Join Discord Donate on Patreon

SimAware

Used mainly as an Airplane tracker, this project tracks any VATSIM traffic and displays it on a easy to read display. I contributed mainly the banners but also programming the API system that powers the system. It uses a REST based API to communicate with VATSIM, and the UI is designed using sass, though no React sadly. Plans to move to a framework are in progress.

Go to Website Source Code
